desc: Pepper jelly is a unique sweet and spicy spread, dip, and glaze that comes in 8 delicious flavors. This gourmet pepper jelly takes a party or event to the next level! Shop online and we will ship to your door. Your satisfaction is guaranteed or you'll get a 100% refund.

layout.text: Be creative. Spread, Dip, and Glaze Chicken, Fish, and Beef!
